actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the  suspension of annual assessment work on mining claims held by location in the United States.

summary.text: Suspends the requirement that not less than $100 worth of labor be performed or improvements aggregating such amount be made each year on mining claims located and awaiting the issuance of patents.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the  suspension of annual assessment work on mining claims held by location in the United States.
